clinical_study.brief_title: Development and Validation of a Deep Learning System for Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Using Endoscopic Images
clinical_study.official_title: Development and Validation of a Deep Learning System for Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Using Endoscopic Images: a Multi-center Prospective Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Eye & ENT Hospital of Fudan University

collaborator.agency: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University
Quan Zhou First Affiliated Hospital of Fujian Medical University
First Affiliated Hospital of Guangxi Medical University
The People' s Hospital of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region
The People' s Hospital of Jiangmen

clinical_study.source: Eye & ENT Hospital of Fudan University

brief_summary.textblock: Develop a deep learning algorithm via nasal endoscopic images from eight NPC treatment centerto detect and screen nasopharyngeal carcinoma(NPC).

detailed_description.textblock: Nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC) is an epithelial cancer derived from nasopharyngeal mucosa. Nasal endoscopy is the conventional examination for NPC screening. It is a major challenge for inexperienced endoscopists to accurately distinguish NPC and other benign dieseases. In this study, we collcet multi-center endoscopic images and train a deep learning model to detect NPC and indicate tumor location. Then, the model perfomance will be compared with endoscopists and be tested prospectively with external dataset.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the receiver operating characteristic curve of the deep learning algorithm
primary_outcome.description: The investigators will calculate the area under the receiver operating characteristic curve of deep learning algorithm and compare this index between deep learning system and human doctors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity of the deep learning system
secondary_outcome.description: The investigators will calculate the sensitivity of deep learning algorithm and compare this index between deep learning system and human doctors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Specificity of the deep learning system
secondary_outcome.description: The investigators will calculate the specificity of deep learning algorithm and compare this index between deep learning system and human doctors.

arm_group.description: Nasopharyngeal endoscopic images collected from 8 hospitals all over China
Nasopharyngeal endoscopic images collected from 8 hospitals all over China
Nasopharyngeal endoscopic images prospectively collected from 8 hospitals all over China

intervention.description: Training dataset was used to train the deep learning model, which was validated and tested by external dataset.

study_pop.textblock: Nasopharyngeal endoscopic images were collected from 8 hospital in NPC epidemic area all over China.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The quality of endoscopic images should clinical acceptable.
- Patients were diagnosed with biopsy(NPC, benign hyperplasia). Control corhort(normal nasopharynx) don't require bispsy result.
Exclusion Criteria:
- images with spots from lens flares or stains, and overexposure were excluded from further analysis.
- image can not expose most part of lesion clearly.
